All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppController
 
BackgroundAudioPlayer
plays audio in the background for the states
BadGuy
Front end bag guy POC
BaseState
public abstract for base state this implements the game
Battle
Battle class for the game , you are sent to this class on collision
BattleCharacter
Objects used to represent the characters in the battle screen
BitmapMethods
interface for bitmap images
Building
bitmap objects the represent the buildings
BuildingManager
deprecated building manager class
Buildings
buildings enum for each type of building
ButtonImages
enum for all button images
Card
Card Object Class, generates the interactive card object
cardClass
public enum for all card classes
CardIcons
public enum for card asset images
Character
abstract class used to create different types of characters from enemies to players, and other players
CharacterCreator
character creator layout
Const
 
CustomButton
 
CustomEditText
 
Doorway
doorway object that connects the two gamemaps
Enemy
extends the Character class, used to generate enemies on the overworld
Entity
abstract class of all Entities to represent hitboxes
Enviorment
environment object that represents the environmental object
Enviorments
Enviorments is used to repersent the bitmap images of the elements in the overworld, shop
Floor
Floor tiles bitmap enum
Game
Game object , this controls the game loop and the gamestate
Game.GameState
state enum
GameCharacters
Bitmap images for the different player characters and enemies
GameConstants
game constants for directions, spite sizes, and animation speed
GameConstants.animation
 
GameConstants.Face_Dir
 
GameConstants.sprites
 
GameLoop
game loop class that will run constantly for the game object
GameMap
Gamemap draws the map of based on the provided tileset
GamePanel
game panel that extends the surfaceview and suface holder
GameStatesInterface
Game state interface for all different game states
HelpMethods
helper methods for doorways and other items
Icons
static images from card images, and ui elements
Keyboard
 
KeyboardImages
 
Login
login layout
LruBitmapCache
 
MainActivity
main activity for the game
MainMenu
custom main menu state - NOT used just for testing purposes
MainMenuActivity
 
MapManager
MapManager class is used to handle all maps for the player and retrieve from the backend
Maps
public enum for maps
Maps.OnAllRequestsCompleted
checks to make sure request are completed before sending
Player
implements the character class, used for the main player
Playing
Playing class The playing class is the core of the overworld game state, this communicates with websockets and gamestateinterface
Signup
 
WebSocketListener
Interface defining methods for handling WebSocket events.
WebSocketManager
Singleton WebSocketManager instance used for managing WebSocket connections in the Android application.
Wisp
 
Wizard
Overworld wizards for all other player characters
